                # Icon

                # 组件注册

                import {Icon} from 'ant-design-vue';

Vue.use(Icon);
                1
                2
                3

                # 代码演示

                <!--vue-ssr-outlet-->
<template>
  <a-icon type="step-backward"/>
  <a-icon type="step-forward"/>
  <a-icon type="fast-backward"/>
  <a-icon type="fast-forward"/>
</template>
